welcome: ===== Welcome to Rock Paper Scissors Spock Lizard! =====
intro: Today you will play against the computer, and the first player who reaches three wins will become the grand winner. Good luck!
prompt_user_choice: Please choose one from the following: {options}.
prompt_instruction: Enter "r" for "rock", "p" for "paper", "sc" for "scissors", "sp" for "spock", or "l" for "lizard".
user_winner: The match is over. You won {user_score} - {computer_score}. Congratulations!
computer_winner: The match is over. Computer won {computer_score} - {user_score}.
prompt_play_again: Do you want to play another game? (y/n)
end_game: Thank you for playing our game. Hope you had a good time!
